hero.title: Welcome
hero.subtitle: SoulTribe.chat is a space created to help you find and connect with your soul tribe ‚Äî people who resonate with your energy, your spirit, and your journey. ‚ú®

how.title: How It Works
how.step1: Create Your Profile ‚Äî enter birth date, time, and place to generate your unique soul map.
how.step2: Discover Your Matches ‚Äî we highlight connections based on compatibility and resonance.
how.step3: Start the Conversation ‚Äî invite matches to chat; safe and private by design.
how.step4: Meet Up (Optional) ‚Äî schedule a Jitsi call or in‚Äëperson meetup with mutual consent.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.step1: Create your account ‚Äî no social logins required.
getting_started.step2: Complete your profile ‚Äî add birth details; approximate time is okay.
getting_started.step3: Set your availability ‚Äî propose local time slots; we handle UTC.
getting_started.step5: Chat & optionally meet ‚Äî keep it in‚Äëapp; schedule when ready.

features.title: Features
features.item1: Astrology‚Äëaware matching ‚Äî connect using your natal chart.
features.item2: Timezone smart scheduling ‚Äî we handle UTC conversions for you.
features.item3: Direct communication via Jitsi ‚Äî text/audio/video; nothing is stored or recorded on SoulTribe.chat.
features.item4: Easy link join ‚Äî private Jitsi room for confirmed meetups; privacy‚Äëfriendly, no desktop install required.
features.item5: Minimalist, focused UI ‚Äî designed for meaningful conversations.
features.read_more: Read the guest Jitsi quick-start guide ‚Üí

privacy.title: Privacy & Safety
privacy.item1: We only ask for what‚Äôs needed to enable soulful connections.
privacy.item2: Your profile details are not sold or shared with ad networks.
privacy.item3: You control who can contact you and when to disclose more.

matching.title: How Matching Works (Short Version)
matching.text: We compute key relational indicators from your chart and compare them with others to find resonance. We prioritize harmony, complementarity, and potential for growth over generic popularity metrics.

protips.title: Pro Tips
protips.item1: Add a few availability slots across different days for quicker connections.
protips.item2: Be genuine in your intro ‚Äî specifics help the right people find you.
protips.item3: Consent first, always. Move at the pace that feels right.

global.title: Global Community, Local Time
global.text: Connect with like-minded souls across the globe with automatic timezone conversion.
global.auto_text: We automatically detect your timezone for seamless scheduling.
global.native_text: Chat in your preferred language with our built-in translation.
global.tz_text: No more timezone math - we handle all the conversions for you.

guestGuide.title: SoulTribe Jitsi Guest Quick-Start
guestGuide.intro: This guide shows first-time guests how to join SoulTribe Jitsi rooms with confidence. Choose the steps you need. Text, audio, and video are all optional.

prejoin.heading: Pre-Join Instructions

steps.options: Know your options. Jitsi supports text, audio, and video. You decide what to enable, and each channel can stay off.
steps.permissions: Grant permissions. When the login page requests access, allow your browser to use the microphone and camera so you can turn them on later.

substeps.name: Name: Enter how you‚Äôd like others to see you in the meeting.
substeps.background: Background: Choose blur or a virtual background if you want extra privacy.

prejoin.mic_camera_text: Use the first two icons to toggle them on or off before you join.
prejoin.devices_after_arrow: to pick the right microphone or webcam.
prejoin.audio_tip_text: A headset or headphones avoids echo. If you need to use speakers, keep the volume low to prevent feedback.

browser.heading: Browser Compatibility
browser.supported: ‚úÖ Firefox & Chrome: Full support for audio, video, and chat.
browser.unsupported: üö´ Safari, Edge, Opera, Brave, DuckDuckGo: Not supported.
browser.note: Other niche browsers have not been verified.
browser.tip1: Enable mic/cam permissions in the browser address bar if prompted.
browser.tip2: Turn off tracker blockers or add Jitsi to the allow-list.
browser.tip3: Reload the tab after changing permissions to apply the new settings.

layout.heading: In-Room Interface Layout
layout.description: The main video area in the center shows everyone currently on camera. Along the bottom, the control bar holds all key icons, including mic, camera, screen share, chat, participants, and more options. Use the arrow drawer on the right edge to open the participant list and shared screens.

microphone.label: Microphone
microphone.description: Toggle your microphone and open the device menu using the arrow icon <svg class="arrow-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" aria-hidden="true"><path fill="currentColor" d="M20.03 16.28a.75.75 0 0 1-1.06 0L12 9.31l-6.97 6.97a.75.75 0 0 1-1.06-1.06l7.5-7.5a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06 0l7.5 7.5a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.06Z"/></svg>.

camera.label: Camera
camera.description: Toggle your camera and choose devices from the menu arrow <svg class="arrow-icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" aria-hidden="true"><path fill="currentColor" d="M20.03 16.28a.75.75 0 0 1-1.06 0L12 9.31l-6.97 6.97a.75.75 0 0 1-1.06-1.06l7.5-7.5a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06 0l7.5 7.5a.75.75 0 0 1 0 1.06Z"/></svg>.

screen.label: Screen Share
screen.description: Share your screen or window. Click to pick a tab, window, or full desktop.

chat.label: Chat
chat.description: Open text chat to send messages or share links. Tap to toggle the side panel.

participants.label: Participants / Invite
participants.description: Invite others or view the current participant list. Copy the room link or admit waiting guests.

more.label: More Options
more.description: Open security options, device settings, or additional tools. Set a password or adjust lobby mode.

quick.heading: Quick Join Link
quick.note: Test your setup or meet friendly guests. No account needed.

closing.heading: Closing Line
closing.text: Enjoy connecting in your own way, on your own terms.

profile.title: Your Profile

birth.instructions: Set your birth date and location to compute your radix. If you don't know the exact time, leave the time field empty and we will use a noon fallback.

profile.note: Your profile is used to personalize matches and time zone display.

radix.title: Your Radix
radix.placeholder: If you have set your birth data, your radix snapshot will appear here.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.overlap_hint: Click ‚ÄúPropose this time‚Äù on an overlap to propose a meetup for that slot.
dashboard.active_filter_hint: Only users active in the last 30 days are shown.
dashboard.slot_help_intro: Slots are the windows of time you publish so SoulTribe can suggest meetups when someone overlaps with you.
dashboard.slot_help_step1: Add one or more slots for the days and hours you are free. The system saves them in your profile timezone and in UTC.
dashboard.slot_help_step2: When matches are fetched, we compare your slots with other members' slots to find overlapping times that are still in the future.
dashboard.slot_help_step3: Overlap chips in the Matches section show the shared window: UTC, your local time, and your match's local time.
dashboard.slot_help_step4: Click ‚ÄúPropose this time‚Äù on an overlap to launch the meetup flow with that slot pre-filled.
dashboard.slot_help_step5: If something changes, edit or delete the slot so we stop suggesting outdated times.
dashboard.slot_help_more: Need extra help? Open the full availability guide from the Docs menu.

login.title: Welcome
login.intro: Login with an existing account or register a new one.
login.redirect_hint: After login you will be redirected to your dashboard.
login.verification_sent: If your email is not yet verified, a new verification email has been sent.
login.reset_sent: If an account with this email exists, a password reset email has been sent.
login.enter_email_first: Please enter your email address first.
login.required_fields: Email, password, and display name are required.
login.registration_success: Account created. Please verify your email.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.intro: Choose a new password for your account.
